*/var Color=function Color(_ref){var color=_ref.color,active=_ref.active,onClick=_ref.onClick;return/*#__PURE__*/ (/* color 객체의 클래스 부여, active 상태에 따라 값 활성화*/React.createElement("div",{className:"color ".concat(color," ").concat(active?' active':''),onClick:onClick}));};export default React.memo(Color);
